entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Vanderhoof
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:21 AM PST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 8.0°C
entry.summary:

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of rain. Temperature steady near plus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of rain beginning near noon. Wind southwest 20 km/h. Temperature steady near plus 5. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain mixed with snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Rain ending near midnight then partly cloudy. Rain mixed with snow late this evening. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Thursday 26 January 2023
